title: Norman the doorman (K)
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Cynthia Freitag
brief_description: Story of Norman the Doorman who lives in the basement of the art museum and faithfully guards the mousehole doorway to the museum. Norman makes a wire sculpture out of mousetraps and enters a sculpture contest in the museum. When he wins, Norman’s prize is a tour through the upstairs galleries.
